#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<math.h>

#define PI 3.1415926535;  //3.1415926535

using namespace std;

long int DistanceTwoPoints(long int x1, long int y1, long int x2, long int y2)
{
    long int distance;
    distance = pow(x2-x1,2)+ pow(y2-y1,2);
    return distance;
}
string TriangleAngleCalculation(long int dist1,long int dist2,long int dist3)
{
    int a[3];
    a[0]=dist1;
    a[1]=dist2;
    a[2]=dist3;
    sort(a,a+3);
    string m;
    if(a[2]==a[0]+a[1])
        m="right";
    else
    if(a[0]+a[1]>a[2])
        m="acute";
    else
        m="obtuse";
    return m;
}

//main function to Calculate angle of triangle given three coordinates c++ code
int main()
{
    int n,t;
    cin>>n>>t;

    long int x1, y1, x2, y2, x3, y3,a,b,c;
    string s,m;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2>>x3>>y3;
        a=DistanceTwoPoints(x1,y1,x2,y2);
        b=DistanceTwoPoints(x2,y2,x3,y3);
        c=DistanceTwoPoints(x3,y3,x1,y1);
        if(a==b || b==c || c==a)
            s="Isosceles";
        else
            s="Scalene";
        if(n!=1)
        {
            m=TriangleAngleCalculation(a,b,c);
            cout<<s<<" "<<m<<" triangle\n";
        }
        else
            cout<<s<<" triangle\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
